item.description:
Its labor day weekend! Time for many hikes. How do the North and South Kinsman's sound for a Sunday hike



Breathtaking 360 degree views of all the mountains via the Lonesome Lake, and Kinsman Ridge Trails!

We can fill up our water when we arrive at Lonesome Lake Hut from both the near beginning and near end which is 1.7 miles from the campground parking lot.

This round trip loop hike is a moderate hike that is 10.0 miles, 3550' of elevation gain, and completed in about 7 hours. You can view and print our trail itinerary at N & S Kinsmans

Are you new to mountain hiking? Meetup and hike to the hut. Hike around t lake and return to the trailhead. Its beautiful.

proper hiking boots and gear required.

Where:Lafayette Campground, Franconia Notch State Park is located on I-93 - the following exit numbers will help you when in the notch. There are pull-offs between Exit 34A & 34B. Mile Marker 108.2 (is clearly visable) Lincoln , NH 03251
When you exit you will see two parking lots. One has a Visitor center, and the one south of that does not. We will meet in the south parking lot which is at the trailhead.
item.name: Peakpagger's 4000ft choice! Lonesome Lake and The Kinsmans!
